title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

title: 锐速安装
content: 锐速安装 1.更新内核 1rpm -ivh http://soft.91yun.org/ISO/Linux/CentOS/kernel/kernel-3.10.0-229.1.2.el7.x86_64.rpm --force 2.查看内核是否安装成功 1rpm -qa | grep kernel 3.如果显示里面有这个内核就对了。 4.重启，查看内核是否更换成功 12rebootuname -r 5.更换完内核后开始安装锐速破解版 1wget -N --no-check-certificate https://github.com/91yun/serverspeeder/raw/master/serverspeeder.sh && bash serverspeeder.sh 6.查看状态 1service serverSpeeder status 7.查看实时信息 1service serverSpeeder stats 8.锐速服务是开机启动的，所以不用进行设置 9.锐速破解版卸载方法 1chattr -i /serverspeeder/etc/apx* && /serverspeeder/bin/serverSpeeder.sh uninstall -f
